scripts.build: pnpm build:node && pnpm build:browser && pnpm types:node && pnpm types:browser
scripts.lint: pnpm lint:stylecheck && pnpm lint:typecheck && pnpm lint:eslint
scripts.publish:major: pnpm version major --workspaces --workspaces-update=false --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m "$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm version minor --workspaces --workspaces-update=false --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m "$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm version patch --workspaces --workspaces-update=false --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m "$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
